name: Infection (SlightlyDarkerBlack)
description:
Controls:

WASD - move

Left Mouse Button - Attack, Interact

Mouse Scroll or Numbers(1, 2, 3) - change weapons

SPACE - dash

C - speed buff

H - heal with potion

M - heal mana with potion

UI

I or TAB - inventory

X - stats

J - skill tree

Supported Devices:

Only for PC at the moment.
